metadata.title: CVE-2019-15213 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 5.2.3. There is ause-after-free caused by a malicious USB device in thedrivers/media/usb/dvb-usb/dvb-usb-init.c driver.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2022-01-28').
linux-aws package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
